mapper.select: SELECT id, sender_id, open_chat_room_id, message, type, is_deleted, deleted_time, created_time FROM open_chats WHERE open_chat_room_id = #{openChatRoomId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT open_chats.id, open_chats.open_chat_room_id, open_chats.message, open_chats.type, open_chats.is_deleted, open_chats.deleted_time, open_chats.created_time users.id as "senderInfo.id", users.nickname as "senderInfo.nickname", users.profile_image as "senderInfo.profileImage" FROM open_chats INNER JOIN users ON open_chats.sender_id = users.id WHERE open_chat_room_id = #{openChatRoomId} AND open_chats.created_time < #{lastCreatedTime} ORDER BY open_chats.createdTime DESC LIMIT #{limit}
